feed.title: Tripal Showcase
feed.subtitle: Tripal Showcase is a small site for sharing Tripal modules.

entry.title: Tripal Devseed
entry.content:
Tripal DevSeed is a miniature dataset designed to instruct new users for loading data into a Tripal site. Once loaded, it is ideal for site testing.

Tripal Devseed

  • Miniature dataset to load all supported Chado data.
  • Detailed, step-by-step guide for loading in Tripal 3.
  • SQL dump to quickly boot a dev site with data.
entry.summary: Tripal DevSeed is a miniature dataset designed to instruct new users for loading data into a Tripal site. Once loaded, it is ideal for site testing.

entry.title: Tripal Analysis Expression
entry.content:
Tripal Analysis Expression is a module that does things.

Tripal Analysis Expression

This is a huge module that weâ€™ve split into three submodules:

Tripal Biomaterial

  • Load in NCBI Biosamples in XML format.
  • Full support for ontologies in Biosample properties.

Tripal Analysis Expression

  • Load in NGS or microarray expression data!
  • Generates heatmaps for list of features with plot.ly.
  • Display D3.js expression graphs on feature pages.

Tripal Protocol

  • Deals with the Protocol, Assay, Arraydesign MAGE tables.
  • Needs collaborators!
entry.summary: Tripal Analysis Expression is a module that does things.

entry.title: Tripal Test Suite
entry.content:
Tripal Test suite adds PHPUnit testing and Travis Continuous Integration to your module!

Tripal Test Suite

  • One command to add PHPunit with access to your Drupal site, and Travis-CI setup.
  • Helper methods, such as factories to generate test Chado data.
entry.summary: Tripal Test suite adds PHPUnit testing and Travis Continuous Integration to your module!

entry.title: Tripal Fields Generator
entry.content:
Tripal Fields Generator is a command line tool for creating Tripal Fields!

Tripal Fields Generator

  • Specify a CVterm, and this tool creates the Field class, formatter, widget, and fields.info stub code for it!
  • Connects to your DB to verify term information.
entry.summary: Tripal Fields Generator is a command line tool for creating Tripal Fields!
